descriptionHtml:
Gauntlets of Gluttonous Power           (v 2.1)
-------------------------------------------------------
Created by: Vindar
A.K.A. _Rahvin_ on the Nexus

Check out my other mods:
Axe of the Beastmaster - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21928/
Boots of Blinding Speed - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21735/
The Fin Gleam - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22103/
Eleidon\'s Ward - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22268/
Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23003/
Don\'t forget to endorse if you like the mod :)

Vindar\'s Value Pack, now located on the Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25122/

Features:
-----------
Adds the \"Gauntlets of Gluttonous Power\" to the game. 
They are located at Valtheim Towers along the White River.
The guantlets are currently in the possesion of a bandit 
warlord named \"Bostock of Blackhearts\", you will have to
kill him to aquire the gauntlets

The Gauntlets of Gluttony where an item originally in 
TES IV: Oblivion, they increased the strength of the user
in exchange for reducing the players max health. In this 
version they increase the user\'s physical damage output as
well as their carry weight at the expense of their max health 
They also have a greater power attached to them that enables 
the player to exchange more health for even more power.

This mod now includes the \"Blackheart\" Itemset, a custom 
textured armor set that has stats simular to ebony armor. and 
the greatsword \"Blade of Blackhearts\". 

Additem Codes: 
Gauntlets of Gluttony - xx000d62
Blade of Blackhearts - xx0068f3
Armor Set - xx0073c0
                 - xx0073c1
                 - xx0073c2

(consistantly on my machine, your\'s may vary) 
(\"xx\" is the load order of the mod)



If code doesn\'t work, use: 
                    help \"Gauntlets of Gluttonous Power\"
                    help \"Blade of Blackhearts\"
                    help \"Blackheart Cuirass\"
                    help \"Blackheart Boots\"
                    help \"Blackheart Gauntlets\"


\"Gauntlets of Gluttonous Power\" can be upgraded 
at a workbench using:
                   1 Ebony Ingot
                   1 Daedra Heart
                   1 Leather

All of the \"Blackheart\" armor set and the 
\"Blade of Blackhearts\" can be upgraded using:
                  1 Corundum Ingot
                  1 Ebony Ingot



Installation:
--------------
Copy the files to your: 

                     Skyrim/Data 

folder, The texture folder will merge with any existing
texture folder, if not it will create a new one. 

Once this is done activate the: 

              GauntletsGluttonousPower.esp

Via your prefered method, NMM, Wyre, or the default
Skyrim launcher. from here you should be all set to go.

Users upgrading from version 1.0 to 2.0 will probably 
need a clean game save.


Compatibility:
----------------
This mod should be compatible with just about any other 
mod out there, all things added used unique ID\'s and did 
not touch any leveled lists. If their are compatibility issues, 
let me know.


Bugs:
-------
Considering the simple nature of this mod, their are no 
known bugs, If you do encounter one, let me know and 
I\'ll do my best to fix it, but please be nice.


Changelog:
--------------
(v 1.0) Initial release
(v 2.0) Compleate rework of concept and addition of 
           \"Blackheart\" gear
(v 2.1) Fixed some texture issues related to female variants.

Usage:
--------
Contact me if you intend to use my mod in anything you 
intend to publish, I did create it, I want a say where it 
goes and what is done to it. Personal use modification 
is ok, but anything public, please contact me.
.
author: Vindar
